paragraph.bymyself: by myself. When I reached the age of 16, I started an apprenticeship as a software engineer at

bierbendiger.description: This project is a school project. This webapplication presents a small social network, for me and my friends. You can on
bierbendiger.description1: create challenges, upload media and more.

silvieundwieni.description: My mother and her boyfriend went to Australia for 3 months. They wanted to share their adventure on a blog, so I created one with wordpress.

apprenticeship.title: Roche Diagnostics International AG
apprenticeship.subtitle: Apprenticeship as an application engineer
apprenticeship.story: I started my apprenticeship with the age of 15. In the first two years I learned a lot about C#, MVC, WPF and Team Foundation Server. With 17 I got confronted with a Linux environment and got used to a lot of technologies like git, AngularJS and Docker.

school.title: Middle school
school.subtitle: Self-taught web developer
school.story: I got my first experience with programming when I was around 13 years old. With the help of youtube tutorials and websites, I tried to build websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and PHP. Additionaly, I passed the First Certificate English, my first diploma.
